spell.name: Bind

components.m: 2 Nature runes, 3 Water runes, 3 Earth runes, all of which the spell consumes

entries: You crush your runes and cast a low level binding curse spell that stops a creature from moving. Make a ranged spell attack against a creature within range. On hit, it takes {@damage 1d6} force damage and are bound by spectral roots. In addition, until the end of its next turn, the creature's speed is reduced to 0.
